name: Zero Agency
description:
Zero is a new type of digital innovation agency, based on the vision of building digital Products + Services to transform the way we communicate. 
We deliver integrated digital communication through a multi-disciplined team specialising in business development, project management, computer science and UI/UX design. 

Through our expertise in commercialising concepts into market ready solutions, we’ve also developed key software products chosen by some of Australia’s largest organisations such as Wesfarmers and Kmart Tyre and Auto Service.
